greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of set partitions of [n] such that n is a multiple of each block size.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..587
formula: a(n) = n! * [x^n] exp(Sum_{d|n} x^d/d!) for n>0, a(0) = 1.
maple: A:= proc(n, k) option remember; `if`(n=0, 1, add(
mathematica: A[n_, k_] := A[n, k] = If[n == 0, 1, Sum[If[j > n, 0, A[n - j, k]* Binomial[n - 1, j - 1]], {j, If[k == 0, Range[n], Divisors[k]]}]];
Table[a[n], {n, 0, 30}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, May 17 2018, translated from Maple *)
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jul 27 2016
